name: IBM Verse - Better Inbox
description: The objective of this style is to increase the user experience by improving the overall design of the IBM Verse inbox. This is achieved by a better allocation of screen space, re-sizing some elements as well as re-coloring lots of items and lines which results in a more intuitive UI.
additional_info:
v1.0
- About 70% more vertical space to display inbox items
- Clean alignment of top-bar items (inbox, waiting for, needs action, primary contacts)
- Clean alignment of primary contact actions (on mouse hover)
- Clean search bar alignment (including buttons, search text and search tags)
- Re-color of unread, read and selected inbox items
- Re-color of all names (sender, invitees etc.), subject lines and more
